import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {Api} from '..' const ProductCard = ({ data }) => { const addtowishlist = () => { const id = data._id console.log(id) const reqpayload = { "productId": id } } return ( <>
{data.Title}
{data.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{data.brandData.name}

{data.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({data.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) } export default ProductCard
